author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Iss Recommends Qualcomm Stockholders Vote On The Blue Proxy Card For Four Of Broadcom's Nominees
text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - Broadcom Ltd:
* LEADING INDEPENDENT PROXY ADVISORY FIRM ISS RECOMMENDS QUALCOMM STOCKHOLDERS VOTE ON THE BLUE PROXY CARD FOR FOUR OF BROADCOM‘S NOMINEES
* BROADCOM - ‍ANNOUNCED INSTITUTIONAL SHAREHOLDER SERVICES RECOMMENDED QUALCOMM STOCKHOLDERS VOTE “FOR” 4 OF BROADCOM‘S INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR NOMINEES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
